name: my-miyabi-app
description: Miyabiフレームワークで構築された自律型開発プロジェクト

scripts.a2a:check: node -e "const {A2AAdapter} = require('./dist/a2a'); console.log('A2A Adapter loaded successfully')"
scripts.debug:check: node -e "const {DebugAgent} = require('./dist/agents/debug'); console.log('Debug Agent loaded successfully')"
